{}.response: Welcome to the Zomi Dictionary API. This API allows you to look up words in the Zomi language and retrieve their meanings, translations, pronunciation, and other relevant information. To use the API, please provide an input with the word you wish to search for in Zomi or the word for which you are seeking a translation or definition. If you are interested in additional linguistic features such as part of speech or usage examples, include those in your request parameters as well. This tool aims to facilitate language learning and promote the understanding of the Zomi language.
